meanings.definition: A thin, flat cake made of batter and cooked on a griddle.
meanings.sent1: Mom made delicious blins for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: I love spreading jam on my blin.
meanings.sent3: The blin was so big, it covered the whole plate!
meanings.sent4: The blin was as thin as a piece of paper.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked blins filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Blin! I forgot my keys at home.
meanings.sent2: Oh blin, I can't believe I missed the bus.
meanings.sent3: Blin, that was a close call!
meanings.sent4: When he saw the mess, he exclaimed, 'Blin!'
meanings.sent5: Blin! It started raining just as I left the house.
